text: able) Abnormality of nail color 90% Abnormality of the fingernails 90% Abnormality of the toenails 90% Hyperhidrosis 90% Abnormal blistering of the skin 50% Anonychia 50% Carious teeth 50% Ichthyosis 50% Neoplasm of the skin 50% Alopecia 7.5% Cataract 7.5% Cognitive impairment 7.5% Corneal dystrophy 7.5% Hepatomegaly 7.5% Laryngomalacia 7.5% Respiratory insufficiency 7.5% Autosomal dominant inheritance - Chapped lip - Dry hair - Epidermoid cyst - Follicular hyperkeratosis - Furrowed tongue - Gin
